title: Acupuncture for Health and Wellness
author: Summit Health Follow Summit Health
description: Acupuncture for Health and Wellness - Download as a PDF or view online for free
cleaned_text: Learn how acupuncture can help diagnose, treat, and prevent certain conditions and diseases, including chronic pain, asthma, allergies, insomnia, hot flashes and stress. Our acupuncturist will demonstrate acupuncture and describe how the ancient techniques can be used with traditional medicine to help you maintain wellness.
